ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] I need help
ygData.msgSnippet: this happened to me before. Check the tpye of card.....chances are when the account deactivated, it chaged from like MC to Visa. That is what happened with me,
ygData.messageBody:
this happened to me before.
Check the tpye of card.....chances are when the
account deactivated, it chaged from like MC to Visa.
That is what happened with me, once I changed it, it
worked.

Also check ALL the information like expiration date, I
think that came up with a default too.

Let us know


--- subxero2002 <subxero2002@...> wrote:
> my wife lost my credit card so we canceled that one
> and got a new one
> well everquest was on that card and it says I dont
> have an account
> any more so I waited until the new card came in and
> tried to re-do
> the biling so I can start up again but everytime I
> put in my new info
> and card number it says it cant connect to login
> server try again.
>
>
